ABD.caption: Category
ABD.doc: A dotted string indicating what the crumb is or from where it comes. Typically it is a module name or a descriptive string. For instance, ui.click could be used to indicate that a click happened.
ABD.name: category

ABF.caption: Level
ABF.doc: This defines the severity level of the breadcrumb. Allowed values are, from highest to lowest: fatal, error, warning, info, and debug. Levels are used in the UI to emphasize and deemphasize the crumb. The default is info.
ABF.name: level

ABG.caption: Data
ABG.doc: Arbitrary data associated with this breadcrumb.
ABG.name: data
